value:
Whether on beach or battlefield,
my duty does not change. I will
protect my charges with my life.

Running along the coast certainly
works the legs. The Knights of Renais
could benefit from this training.

It is not my place to comment on
a swimsuit of Princess Eirika's
choosing—and yet... Never mind.

I would prefer to stay on the shore.
It is easier to spot dangers as they
approach from this vantage point.

Do not fear. My armor is stowed
under a nearby tree. I can spring
into action at a moment's notice.

I hope you will do me the honor
of accepting this summertime gift
from $Nf.

I will protect Eirika when necessary,
by whatever means are required.
That is why I have come here.

Though I have shed my armor for
a swimsuit, my senses remain as
focused as ever.

To think I could be brought so low
by mere heat...

Thank you. There was no need for
you to go out of your way for me
in this blazing-hot weather.

I am Seth, of the Knights of Renais.
Prince Ephraim asked me to join
the princess on her retreat.

I had not expected to find you here
so late, $Nu.$k$pIt's getting dark. The princess has
returned to her lodging, and you
should as well. We will dine soon.$k$pOh, I see. You meant to watch the
sun sink below the horizon...
Forgive my intrusion then.$k$pIt is a beautiful sight, that bright
vermilion jewel slowly sliding out
of view... I cannot blame you.$k$pI ask the princess to return to her
lodging early every night purely out
of interest in her safety, but...$k$pI think perhaps I will not protest her
remaining outside a while longer in
the future, if only to see the sunset.
A summer's duty.
No quarter!
Ready for anything!
Tropical attack!
I was indiscreet...
ふう…
I am merely here to escort Princess Eirika.
*splutter* Do try to avoid splashing me with water, inadvertently or otherwise.
I must do my utmost to ensure Princess Eirika does not suffer a sunburn.
The proof of a knight's duty is the scars his body bears.
I have my duties. Rest comes when appropriate.
I hope that Princess Eirika can enjoy a moment of respite, however fleeting it may be...
I must express my gratitude. It has been a great pleasure to spend time with you like this.
Right.
As you say.
Now then...
